title: Portfolio Website
description:
A simple website to showcase my projects and act as an online resume.
Driven by vanilla javascript, this website also connects to a static JSON database on the front-end containing all text and image urls for the projects I'm showcasing. Including what you're reading now! This JSON file also doubles as a very barebones CMS I use when adding new projects to the website.

title: PDF Compressor
description: Reduces pdf file size by approximately 86%, this project combines the use of both frontend and backend technologies specifically JavaScript (both on the client and server) as well as Bash and GhostScript. Bash and GhostScript are responsible for the actual compression of the file sent to the express server by the client.
